The claim was debunked by fact: checking organizations, including FactCheck.org, which is working with Facebook to debunk misinformation shared on social media.
The story was published on a website kno: America's Last Line of Defense, and the publication's work is often erroneously spread as news.
The headline of the article itself: Pelosi Offers to Drop Impeachment In Exchange For Full Immigrant Amnesty," is misleading and does not reflect the actual stance of House Speaker Nancy Pelosi.
Facebook users in pro: Trump groups spread and opine on the headline as if it is real, without clicking beyond the viral headline to see the obvious signs of the story's suspect nature.
